attributes.action: ensure that Mr Speaker is required to refund the public purse, in full, all of the legal costs incurred in any challenge to the right of the taxpayer to be able to see how much MPs are spending on themselves and their families out of the public purse.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is no limit to the subterfuge this man will employ - at OUR expense, of course - to stop us finding out just how much these people are troughing from taxpayers, thousands of whom who can afford only one main meal of beans on toast a day - if they also wish to keep warm.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
